meanings.definition: A type of plant that grows in wooded areas.
meanings.sent1: The woodrushes added a touch of green to the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: We spotted some woodrushes while hiking through the woods.
meanings.sent3: The woodrushes seemed to be having a little dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The woodrushes stood tall like tiny soldiers guarding the forest.
meanings.sent5: The woodrushes swayed gently in the wind, creating a peaceful scene.

meanings.definition: The plural form of woodrush, referring to multiple plants.
meanings.sent1: I gathered a bunch of woodrushes to study their different features.
meanings.sent2: The woodrushes in the garden were thriving under the shade of the trees.
meanings.sent3: The woodrushes whispered secrets to each other in the quiet of the woods.
meanings.sent4: The woodrushes formed a beautiful carpet of green beneath the trees.
meanings.sent5: The woodrushes swayed together in harmony, creating a mesmerizing sight.
